content: p1 k1 k2tog k1 around 40 sts 8 knit around 9 sl1 pw k2tog psso k2 around 20 sts 10 k2tog around 10 sts finishing cut the yarn leaving at least a 12 yarn end using the darning needle thread the yarn through the remaining 10 stitches at least twice cinch snugly and anchor the yarn weave in the yarn ends steam or block the hat if desired 3 | pa ge
